definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (cf. n.pr. [[שמעון]] in Palm. Lzb:378; meaning doubtful; Rs al. cp. sim9un said to mean offspring of hyena and wolf; v. Hogg:EBiv. 4531);—
second son of Jacob and Leath, Sumewh: Ge 29:33 (name expl. from [[שָׁמַע]]), Ge 35:23, Ex 1:2 + 14 t. (assoc. esp.with Levi Ge 34:25, Ge 34:30, Ge 49:5).
post-ex. Jew with foreign wife Ezr 10:31.
